title: FEAST Activity
synopsis: This form of writing and co-creation that we explore is new. It is an unusual and new way to collaborate, one which encourages us to share our early thoughts as we see them pass from hand to hand. This process we have called before [[Writing With Strangers]].

title: Thought Garden
synopsis: Thought Garden is an [[Open Think Tank]], where we look to have new forms of conversation.

title: Thought Garden Members
synopsis: Members are either Individuals or Projects

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Below we list our growing group of researchers. Try not to fork this page. It is a master copy that all [[FEAST Activity]] pages refer to.
